object.name: project_companies
object.property: All companies involved in project along with company name etc that can be used as vocabulary for pulldown when creating new users.

<model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <fieldset name="company" label="Company" description="Important company information."> <field name="full_name" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Complete name of company</description> <title>Full Company Name</title> </field> <field name="short_name" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>A shorter name. this will be used in the project for listings, ownership of work, etc.</description> <title>Short Company Name</title> </field> <field name="code" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>enter a 3 letter code. this will be used in project where short identifier is needed.</description> <max_length>3</max_length> <min_length>3</min_length> <title>Company 3 letter code</title> </field> <field name="company_role" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <title>Company Role</title> <values> <element>Choose</element> <element>Prime</element> <element>Public Relations</element> <element>Construction</element> <element>More</element> </values> </field> <field name="logo" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobFile"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Company Logo</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="address" label="Address" description="Address Information"> <field name="address" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>e.g. 141 Reservoir Ave.</description> <title>Full Street Address</title> </field> <field name="city" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>City</title> </field> <field name="other_address" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Other address</title> </field> <field name="states" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <title>State</title> <values> <element>Select</element> <element>WA</element> <element>OR</element> <element>ID</element> </values> </field> <field name="zip" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>ZIP</title> </field> <field name="main_phone_number" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Main Phone Number</title> </field> <field name="fax_number" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Fax Number</title> </field> </fieldset> </schema> </model>
